title: Entry Quality Score Components
prompt: Create a dashboard showing entry signal quality scoring. Center: Large radial chart with 5 spokes representing score components, filled area showing current scores. Components: 'POI Quality' (0-25), 'Rejection Strength' (0-20), 'Regime Alignment' (0-20), 'Kill Zone Bonus' (0-20), 'Multi-TF Confluence' (0-15). Each spoke labeled with current value. Total score displayed in center: '87/100'. Right panel: Quality tier badges - 'A+ Trade' (90-100, gold), 'A Trade' (75-89, green), 'B Trade' (60-74, yellow), 'Skip' (<60, red). Current tier highlighted. Bottom: Individual component progress bars. Dark slate background (#1E293B). Modern analytics dashboard style.
negative_prompt: cluttered radar chart, overlapping labels, hard to read scores, inconsistent styling
